attributes.additional_details: Thousands of people have motorcross motorcycles taken from them every year because they ride them on public land. The UK is full of  land that has not been used in years,lets allocate this unclaimed land for the use of the general public. Not just for motorcross but for any outdoor activity.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual land owners; it is not clear what action the petitioner is expecting the Government to take.
